name: Flippy Flipped Out Battle!
description:
Are you in the mood for rap battles at weekend?  This the one for you, We'll bring to you a new music arrow game with credible rhythm battles. This time, new characters will have to fight for his life in rap battles once again to prove themselves. Let our new enemies help your weekend be better.


HOW TO WIN :
- Make arrows perfectly match.
- Beat all enemies, climb on top rank.
- Feel funny rhythm! Rock the beat!

download it now for FREE !
